ELIGIBILITY

Which one are you?

Student of university or High school graduated

  • No Experience in Digital Marketing
  • 19+ Years old
  • Able to work remotely as part time
  • Have a good internet connection
  • Potential to start career as Digital Marketing Specialist with Salary IDR 5Million / month (Average)

Fresh Graduate or Early career stage

  • Switch career person is welcome
  • 23+ Years old
  • Able to work remotely or working hybrid
  • Have a good internet connection
  • Potential to start career as Digital Marketing Specialist/Analyst with Salary IDR 7-8Million / month (Average)

Well Experienced or Business People

  • 28+ Years old
  • Able to work remotely or working hybrid
  • Have a good internet connection
  • Potential to start career as Digital Marketing Specialist/Analyst with Salary IDR 15Million/ month (Average)

WHY QARIR ?

Focused on your value development not only skill

We focused on your skill development, our syllabus designed by Industry leader to help you have a great value in front of your interviewer or your dream company.

Never have a career stuck after joining Qarirgenerator. Support from Career Coach, Career Psychologist, and Job Connector access are totally free for all of our alumni endless service with love.

30 Days Money Back Guarantee
